title: Mini Myth: When Apollo Met Hyacinthus, A Frisbee Tragedy
itunes:title: Mini Myth: When Apollo Met Hyacinthus, A Frisbee Tragedy
itunes:subtitle: Starting Pride off with a bang, the tragic story of Apollo and Hyacinthus.CW/TW: far too many Greek myths involve assault. Given it's fiction, and typically involves gods and/or monsters, I'm not as deferential as I would be were I referen...
description:
Starting Pride off with a bang, the tragic story of Apollo and Hyacinthus.


CW/TW: far too many Greek myths involve assault. Given it's fiction, and typically involves gods and/or monsters, I'm not as deferential as I would be were I referencing the real thing.


Sources: Ovid's Metamorphoses, translated by Allen Mandelbaum and Theoi.com.


Attributions and licensing information for music used in the podcast can be found here: mythsbaby.com/sources-attributions.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
